General.Name: Coloray International Investment Co. Ltd
General.Description: Coloray International Investment Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of pearl pigments and mica powder in China. It also involved in Wholesale/retail and trade of cosmetics and cosmetic pigments, as well as research and development activities. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Deqing Eco & Tech Dev. Zone, Huzhou, China
